title: A Christmas Carol 1935 (Drama, Family) A Charles Dickens adaption | by Henry Edwards

sources.title: A Christmas Carol 1935 (Drama, Family) A Charles Dickens adaption | by Henry Edwards
sources.description:
Ebenezer Scrooge, a cold and miserly old man, detests Christmas and all it represents. On Christmas Eve, he is visited by the ghost of his late partner, who warns him that three spirits will come to show him the consequences of his bitterness. Through visions of his past, present, and a bleak future, Scrooge discovers the true meaning of compassion and the spirit of Christmas, leading him to transform his life.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/OX_-4yABrc4

Original title: Scrooge (1935) AKA: A Christmas Carol
Subtitles are available in many languages

Director: Henry Edwards
Writers: Charles Dickens, H. Fowler Mear
Stars:  Seymour Hicks, Donald Calthrop, Robert Cochran
Genres: Drama, Family, Fantasy, Literary


@CultCinemaClassics 

Christmas films: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZ63y5rV0f_GSG3am3bx1n1
